item.title: Hugo theme first looks
item.description: Hugo has been amazing so far and the theme I’ve chosen is Hugo.386. I just loved the old windows look. I guess I’ll keep the theme for a while.

item.title: Jekyll to Hugo
item.description: So I just decided to try out *** Hugo **** for a change. The migration has been manual but easy. Thanks to the documentation. Most impressive part is the speed, of course. I’d like to add that it’s better to keep the front matter to the minimum and avoid unneccessary customizations to keep your site portable between different themes as well as engines. Also I’m doing this via a better deployment model(I guess!
